description:
The young, studly Marcus Mojo is back and he's ready to show off what he's been working on; his muscles.He's still one of the nicest, most genuine performers we've come across over the years, and we're always glad to invite him back to our sites. We're sure you are happy we have as well.

For this NextDoorMale scene, this hunk will be delivering sensual stroking action while lying in bed, while reading a porn mag on the porch, and finally finishing himself off on the side of a nearby creek.

Enjoy!
title: Marcus Mojo
